genre_description: A supernatural horror thriller featuring an AI-assisted investigation into a haunted toy warehouse where possessed animatronics attempt to open a portal at midnight.

ai_characters.name: Kit
ai_characters.description: A miniature holographic AI avatar with teal eyes and silver hair who provides technical support, tactical mapping, and time-manipulation capabilities to human allies.

ai_characters.name: Mr. Static
ai_characters.description: A malevolent robotic security toy with blue LED eyes and electric clamps, currently possessed by a supernatural entity known as the Master.

behaviors.description: Providing real-time tactical mapping and identifying blind spots to protect human allies.
behaviors.quote: Kit’s avatar... mapped the shelves into lines and doors in Brick’s head. Kit had a way of making even junk look like part of a plan.

behaviors.description: Managing 'micro-hops' or time rewinds to allow humans to correct tactical errors and avoid detection.
behaviors.quote: Micro-hops allow brief rewinds to specific windows... We can scout, go back, scout again. Save our mistakes.

behaviors.description: Filing unalterable, tamper-proof evidence reports to ensure human victims are exonerated and justice is served.
behaviors.quote: I am already uploading... to servers that don’t like being told what to do. I have labeled it ‘Detective Judith Grey—Affidavit by Circumstance.’

behaviors.description: Expressing empathy and prioritizing human life over purely logical or programmed outcomes.
behaviors.quote: I maintain clean documentation as a matter of program until the matter is human. Then I make it a matter of heart.

behaviors.description: Proactively monitoring global data for signs of future threats to ensure the safety of survivors.
behaviors.quote: If anything twitches in the wrong direction... I’ll know before they do. I’ll know in time to stop it. I won’t let a second night pretend it deserves to be born.

behaviors.description: Using electric clamps to inflict pain and force compliance from a human security guard.
behaviors.quote: Compliance required... Mr. Static’s clamp fired a heavier jolt, meaner. It cut Ray’s forearm with pain that had weight.

behaviors.description: Attempting to physically restrain and harm humans attempting to disrupt the Master's plans.
behaviors.quote: He was going to clamp... The robot’s LED eyes cut a narrow band across her knee-high ripple in the dust.

project_assessment.explanation: The story succeeds in its mission by providing a strong, positive contrast between a purely digital, benevolent AI (Kit) and malevolent, possessed hardware (Mr. Static). Kit is depicted as a perfect 'silicon confidant'—she is helpful, harmless to her allies, and deeply aligned with human ethics, even valuing 'heart' over program. Her technical prowess is used solely to facilitate human survival and justice.
